participant_1.background:
I recall fondly the days I used to spend running around with my friends, pretending to be superheroes.
my favorite tv show is friends.
i am a cheerleader.
i have never had candy in my life.
I would like to be reincarnated as someone who is loved by my family and is successful in their career.

participant_2.background:
I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work.
I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.
I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Good! I'm taking a break from work to take a walk in the canyon. What are you doing today?
I'm a cheerleader at my school and we have a game tonight, so I'm just resting up and watching basketball highlights on my phone.
That's so cool! I love basketball too. What team do you like?
I'm a big fan of the Golden State Warriors. They're my favorite team.
They're pretty good! I like the Phoenix Suns, but I don't think they're very good this year.
Yeah, they're not doing so hot this season. But I'm still a fan!
I'm sure they'll turn it around. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my friends and family. We like to go to the movies, play games, and just hang out.
That sounds like fun! I love spending time with my family too. We like to go on hikes, go to the beach, and just relax.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I could do more outdoor activities, but I'm not very active. I'm more of a couch potato.
That's okay! Everyone has their own interests. I'm sure you're great at what you do.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so
